title: CONTROL-M - USUAL SCRIPT / BACTHES DEACTIVATION - DEACTIVATION OF THE USUAL CONTROL-M PLAN

task_list.instruction_title:
DESACTIVATION DU CTRL-M STANDARD BANQUE QUI DOIT ÊTRE MONTé AU PLAN A 15H

Note : Reactivation of Standard CTRL-M plan is done in IP Task [PRE-11709](PRE-11709_116109798.html)
